title: Number of Starwood Hotels and Resorts hotels worldwide 2009 to 2015
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hotels, containing a total of 7 data points.
Overall Number of hotels has increased over the Year.
Number of hotels is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Number of hotels, of value 1207.0 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Number of hotels about 942.0 was reached at Year 2009
